string.value: The #b#p2050002##k, who has failed at keeping #o6220001# under control, informs you that #m221000000# will be in danger if nothing is done to control #o6220001# soon. Let's hurry over to #b#p2050001##k and let him know.

When you tell #p2050001# everything you've heard from #p2050002# using the Wave Translator, #p2050001# asks you to defeat Zeno for the safety of this world. Based on #p2050001#'s speculation, #o6220001# can be found in a place called #b#m221040301##k, where you can reach from #m221040300#. Let's rush over to defeat #r#o6220001##k once and for all! \n\n#o6220001# #r#a34571##k

You have defeated #o6220001# and reported your progress to #p2050001#. Not only does #m221000000# have to worry about the safety of the world, but also the safety of the #p2050002#... No wonder #m221000000# is always busy.

Hmm, did you bring the information you got from the Alien Grays? ...Mmmmm. I can't believe they've failed at controlling Zeno. The Grays always took great pride in their perfectly organized society, but even they couldn't manage this situation. That was useful. Thanks a lot.

Zeno will affect the Omega Sector too? We can't have that happen. I don't think that one Zeno can put the entire Omega Sector in danger, but It's better to be safe than sorry. We'll need your help again.

Please defeat #rZeno#k for us. It'll be ea piece of cake for someone like you. I've already located Zeno. It seems like Zeno makes frequent appearances in #bGray Field#k, and you can reach this place from Kulan Field 4. I'll be counting on you.
Are you declining this mission? Bummer. Shall I call the Mesorangers then...?

Ah, you've defeated Zeno. I really appreciate your hard work. I've been so fortunate to have met someone like you. We need you in the Omega Sector. What do you think about becoming the 5th Mesoranger? You will be in neon orange... Not your cup of tea?
Please come back to see me if you want to become a Mesoranger. We'll be happy to welcome you whenever.
I suppose you haven't defeated #rZeno#k yet. Have you forgotten where Zeno is? You can find Zeno in #bGray Field#k, and you can get there from Kula Field 4.
